company.description: We put years of accumulated experience within your reach and work diligently to provide all the solutions and business services that help you excel.
company.additionalInfo: Establish your company in Dubai with ease and professionalism.

step1.title: Security Approval
step1.description: Our team assists you in obtaining all necessary approvals.

step2.title: Company Setup
step2.description: Sign the service contracts and get your license.

step3.title: Residency
step3.description: Apply for residency services and any required visas.

section1.title: Everything You Need in One Place
section1.description1: An exceptional environment that meets all your requirements.
section1.description2: High-quality service available to all our clients.
section1.description3: Speak in your preferred language, and we're here to assist.
section1.point4: No need to be present yourself
section1.description4: Complete the procedure while staying in your country.

section2.title: Top Quality Service at Lower Cost
section2.point1: You can rely on FirstAmazeGroup to complete all procedures for establishing a company in Dubai in record time if all your documents are ready, with no hidden fees and without any difficulties.
section2.point2: Enter the UAE market with confidence and establish your business now with our flexible solutions and services that meet all your business requirements.

info_section.title: FirstAmazeGroup is Your Ideal Way to Start Your Business
info_section.paragraph1: FirstAmazeGroup is a company specialized in business setup and development, aiming to provide comprehensive support for investors and project owners to help them establish their businesses in Dubai by offering a full range of services.
info_section.paragraph2: We strive to deliver innovative solutions to guide our local and international clients along the right path.
info_section.paragraph3: As a leading company in business setup, we offer creative solutions with the help of our expert consultants to make business setup processes faster and easier.
info_section.paragraph4: You can rely on FirstAmazeGroup to complete all procedures for establishing a company in Dubai in record time if all your documents are ready, with no hidden fees and no difficulties.

explore_market_requirements.title: Explore market requirements
explore_market_requirements.subtitle: ITQAN team of business consultants can help you expedite the process of setting up your company as well as reserving a trade name.

invest_in_dubai.title: Invest in Dubai
invest_in_dubai.subtitle: Dubai is an international business hub that promotes growth by ensuring the greatest levels of efficiency, security, and prosperity in order to reach unprecedented levels of fast expansion.

flexible_workspaces.title: Flexible workspaces and Solid Infrastructure
flexible_workspaces.subtitle: We provide premium workspaces that meet all your business requirements.

team_section.title: Business Consultants at FirstAmazeGroup
team_section.description: Our team consists of top experts in consulting, with knowledge and experience in technical, legal, and business domains. They are dedicated to providing innovative solutions for our clients and guiding them to success.

contact_form.subtitle: As a leading company in business setup, FirstAmazeGroup's team of consultants can help you expedite the process of establishing your business. Additionally, you can rely on FirstAmazeGroup to handle all formalities efficiently.
contact_form.name: Name
contact_form.get_support: Get exclusive support for your business
